content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('usp_UpdateDimUser', 'P') IS NOT NULL
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_UpdateDimUser]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE PROC [dbo].[usp_UpdateDimUser] 
AS

UPDATE dim
SET
  --dim.EffFromDate = updt.EffFromDate,
  dim.EffToDate = updt.EffToDate,
  dim.IsCurrent = updt.IsCurrent
 -- dim.ProcessDate = GETDATE()
--SELECT *
FROM [Dim].[User] dim
INNER JOIN 
(
  SELECT
    ID,
    --DENSE_RANK()  OVER(PARTITION BY Email, Client, ExternalID ORDER BY UserCreateDate) EventID,
    --ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY Email, Client, ExternalID ORDER BY UserCreateDate) EventID,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SourceUserkey ORDER BY EffFromDate) EventID,
    Email, 
    Client, 
    ExternalID,
    IsActive,
    UserCreateDate,
    --UserCreateDate AS EffFromDate,
    --LEAD(UserCreateDate)  OVER(PARTITION BY Email, Client, ExternalID ORDER BY UserCreateDate) EffToDate,
    LEAD(EffFromDate)  OVER(PARTITION BY SourceUserkey ORDER BY EffFromDate) EffToDate,
    GETDATE() AS ProcessDate,
    --CASE 
    --  WHEN LEAD(UserCreateDate)  OVER(PARTITION BY Email, Client, ExternalID ORDER BY UserCreateDate) IS NULL THEN 1
    --  ELSE 0
    --  END AS IsCurrent,
    CASE 
      WHEN LEAD(EffFromDate)  OVER(PARTITION BY SourceUserkey ORDER BY EffFromDate) IS NULL THEN 1
      ELSE 0
      END AS IsCurrent,
    SourceUserKey
  FROM [Dim].[User]
) updt
ON updt.ID = dim.ID;
/*Uncomment after the first run and add WHERE clause to update the records with current Fingerprint
WHERE
  ISNULL(dim.EffFromDate, GETDATE()) <> ISNULL(updt.EffFromDate, GETDATE()) OR
  ISNULL(dim.EffToDate, GETDATE()) <> ISNULL(updt.EffToDate, GETDATE()) OR
  dim.IsCurrent <> updt.IsCurrent
*/

UPDATE dim
SET
  dim.UserCreateDate = updt.UserCreatedDate
FROM [Dim].[User] dim
INNER JOIN 
(
  SELECT
    SourceUserKey,
    MIN(UserCreateDate) UserCreatedDate
  FROM [Dim].[User]
  GROUP BY SourceUserKey
) updt
ON updt.SourceUserKey = dim.SourceUserKey;

UPDATE dim
SET
  dim.EffFromDate = updt.UserCreateDate
FROM [Dim].[User] dim
INNER JOIN 
(
  SELECT
    ID,
    UserCreateDate,
    EffFromDate
  FROM [Dim].[User]
) updt
ON updt.ID = dim.ID
WHERE dim.EffFromDate IS NULL;
